content: गडु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गड्-उन्] Crooked, hump backed. --डुः {@--1@} A hump on the back. {@--2@} A javelin. {@--3@} A water-pot. {@--4@} An earth-worm. {@--5@} Any superfluous excrescence or addition, a useless object; see अंतर्गडु. {@--6@} A goitre, excrescence on the neck. {@--7@} A hump-backed person.
